dc_description_s: This line shapefile contains local government areas for Nigeria as of January 2007. These are the level 2 administrative units (ADM2) for Nigeria. This layer is part of the Map Library dataset containing line and polygon boundaries for individual countries on the African continent. The Map Library is a project of the UK charity â€œThe Map Maker Trust." It aims to make public domain mapping data more readily available for development in all kinds of fields, from health care to urban management, from de-mining to environmental protection. Map Maker Ltd. (2007). Local Government Area Boundaries, Nigeria, 2007 Map Maker, Ltd. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/rn736kz7913.
